definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of animals : wild ox ([[רְאֵם]]) Job 39:9 (sq. [[עַל־אֲבוּסְֶָ]] ), porcupine ([[קִפּׂד]]) Zep 2:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: inanim. subj. = remain all night : of fat of sacrifice Ex 23:18 (E; sq. [[עַד־בּׂקֶר]]), passover meal Ex 34:25 (P; sq. [[לַבּׂקֶר]]), De 16:4 (sq. [[לַבּׂקֶר]]; all these without local designation), wages of hireling Le 19:13 (H ; [[אֶת]] = with + [[עַד־בּׂקֶר]]); of dead body De 21:23 ([[עַל]] loc.); dew Job 29:19 ([[ב]] loc.); bunch of myrrh Ct So 1:13 [[בֵּין]] loc.)

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: fig. [[יׇלִין בֶָּכִי בָּעֶרֶב]] Ps 30:6 at evening weeping may come to lodge (opp. [[וְלַבּׂקֶר רִנָּה]]). †

fig. abide, remain, subj. [[עַיִן]] ( = look upon), c. [[ב]] Job 17:2; of error, Job 19:4 (c. prep. [[אֵת]] pers.), strength Job 41:14 (of crocod.; c. [[ב]]); of righteousness, Is 1:21 (c. [[ב]]); [[תָּלִין נַפְשׁוֹ בְטוֹב]] Ps 25:13; of hearkening ear Pr 15:31, c. [[בְּקֶרֶב]]; of thoughts Je 4:14, c. id.; abs., of man, continue, endure, Ps 49:13, [[שָׂבֵעַ יׇלִין]] Pr 19:23 he shall continue satisfied.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇלִין]] cause to rest, lodge, sq. acc., 2Sa 17:8 v. Kö:i. 509.

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
